channel.title: Whonix workstation clipboard sharing on qemu + kvm
channel.description: Is there a way to enable clipboard sharing for the whonix workstation? It works fine in the gateway but I do need it enabled for workstation. I'm using virt manager with qemu + kvm.

item.title: Whonix workstation clipboard sharing on qemu + kvm
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Whonix workstation clipboard sharing on qemu + kvm

item.title: Whonix workstation clipboard sharing on qemu + kvm
item.dc:creator: 0x1f
item.description:
Sure, in Virt-Manager Edit > Preferences > check “Enable XML editing”
in workstation click on the bulb at top left > Overview > XML

Find and replace <clipboard copypaste="no"/> to <clipboard copypaste="yes"/>

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix workstation clipboard sharing on qemu + kvm
